newsitem.title: TRINIDAD AND TOBAGO: Nine sentenced to hang in Trinidad.
newsitem.headline: Nine sentenced to hang in Trinidad.

text.p: A man alleged to be a major drug trafficker and eight others were sentenced to death on Tuesday for killing four people in 1994.
After a 56-day trial, a jury found alleged drug kingpin Dole Chadee and the others guilty on a total of 36 counts of murder and sentenced to hang.
They were convicted of murdering four members of a south Trinidad family on January 10, 1994.
